column5: Karma, Fate and add in Numerology  So in keeping with Solo Paddler's post I thought I would share this and see what kind of response comes from it  After work yesterday I had a question and answer period with a potential suitor, on the drive there for no apparent reason a few things occurred to me. The place I worked before where I am now was 880 _____rd the place I am at now 2580 and the place I was at when I got out of the forces was 1680. Well it just so happens that the place I was on my way to was also 880. So now things get really weird inside the bucket I was born on the 28th my 10 anniversary was 08/08/08 I’m 44 this year 4+4 is 8 and the year is 2008 in the 8th month and I’m driving a 98 vehicle.  My black and white bucket says no to hocus pocus mumbo jumbo but tucked away deep inside there somewhere in the depths something is telling me this is as it should be and I should really be looking at this.  So there you go how would you intemperate this phenomenon????????  Peter
Slow Dog last night and Im paying for it in spades today

Well here is another add on that just came to me our units Canadian Coast Gaurd Auxillary number is 8 and I am on crew 8   now its getting weird  wait this just in the ship I was on in the Navy   HMCS FRASER  DDH 233       2+3+3 = 8
I think it's telling you that you have way too much time on your hands to be thinking about this.  Either go fishing or get back to work.
Hey Peter, Pick a number between 1 and 10.  MMMMMM, I guess 8,
Go buy a lotto 649 for the next draw....  08 18 28 38 44 48  Lemme know how that works out for you!
The Chinese (Cantonese) believe the number 8 to be the luckiest number.
Must be why the #8 dinner comes with free egg roll  Bushart
How many years have you worked at that building...
